title: Будьте счастливы
overview: Nadya's world is crumbling: she is childless, her husband leaves for someone else. After a divorce, a woman decides that she has no reason to live anymore, but at the last moment she is saved by an ambulance called by someone unknown. Having come to her senses, Nadya acquires a wonderful gift - to see people destined for each other by fate. She understands that she must connect couples, and a suitable place of work immediately turns up for her - the registry office. But how can you explain to people who don't suspect anything about Nadya's abilities that they should be together?
